intro_text: Proficient in machine learning technologies with hands-on experience in supervised and unsupervised learning

regression: Fitting numerics for prediction and cutomizing loss for objective optimization
classification: Multi class classification using traditional ML and neural networks
clustering: Supervised and unsupervised data clustering for visualization & further analysis
time_series: Time sequence based trend & seasonality analysis using ARIMA, Prophet and so on
pca: Visualized dimensionality reduction for feature engineering & data assessment
anomaly_detection: Refining data & excluding anomalies for model training and data auditing

widget_maintenance: A data science project on the widget maintenance dataset of ExampleCo, Inc to explore feature trends of its data generating system and predict the units that are mostly likely to fail.
